articles.description: Among the actors who emerged during Hong Kong cinema's golden age in the 80s and 90s, Tony Leung Ka-fai is one whose star still shines bright.
articles.content: Among the actors who emerged during Hong Kong cinema's golden age in the 80s and 90s, Tony Leung Ka-fai is one whose star still shines bright. The prolific actor now serves as juror for the Golden Go… [+244 chars]
